blueprint_book.label: [font=count-font][color=brown]Inline Depots[/color][/font]
blueprint_book.description:
Premade stations for the recommended train lengths.
Inset into straight rail for extra compactness.
Not recommended in places where you might want to change the railway layout in the future.
A train can use  a depot as long as it fits, it doesn't have to be the exact length. They'll still only use the one asigned to the same group though.
